ayahs.textUthmani: وَلَوْ شَآءَ رَبُّكَ لَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّاسَ أُمَّةً وَٰحِدَةً ۖ وَلَا يَزَالُونَ مُخْتَلِفِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَلَوْ [And if] شَآءَ [your Lord (had) willed] رَبُّكَ [your Lord (had) willed] لَجَعَلَ [surely He (could) have made] ٱلنَّاسَ [the mankind] أُمَّةًۭ [one community] وَٰحِدَةًۭ ۖ [one community] وَلَا [but not] يَزَالُونَ [they will cease] مُخْتَلِفِينَ [to differ]
ayahs.transliteration: Walaw shaa rabbuka lajaAAala annasaommatan wahidatan wala yazaloonamukhtalifeen

ayahs.textUthmani: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ رَبُّكَ ۚ وَلِذَٰلِكَ خَلَقَهُمْ ۗ وَتَمَّتْ كَلِمَةُ رَبِّكَ لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجْمَعِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: إِلَّا [Except] مَن [(on) whom] رَّحِمَ [your Lord has bestowed Mercy] رَبُّكَ ۚ [your Lord has bestowed Mercy] وَلِذَٰلِكَ [and for that] خَلَقَهُمْ ۗ [He created them] وَتَمَّتْ [And will be fulfilled] كَلِمَةُ [(the) Word of your Lord] رَبِّكَ [(the) Word of your Lord] لَأَمْلَأَنَّ [Surely I will fill] جَهَنَّمَ [Hell] مِنَ [with] ٱلْجِنَّةِ [the Jinn] وَٱلنَّاسِ [and the men] أَجْمَعِينَ [all together]
ayahs.transliteration: Illa man rahima rabbuka walithalikakhalaqahum watammat kalimatu rabbika laamlaanna jahannama minaaljinnati wannasi ajmaAAeen

ayahs.textUthmani: وَكُلًّا نَّقُصُّ عَلَيْكَ مِنْ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلرُّسُلِ مَا نُثَبِّتُ بِهِۦ فُؤَادَكَ ۚ وَجَآءَكَ فِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلْحَقُّ وَمَوْعِظَةٌ وَذِكْرَىٰ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَكُلًّۭا [And each] نَّقُصُّ [We relate] عَلَيْكَ [to you] مِنْ [of] أَنۢبَآءِ [(the) news] ٱلرُّسُلِ [(of) the Messengers] مَا [(for) that] نُثَبِّتُ [We may make firm] بِهِۦ [with it] فُؤَادَكَ ۚ [your heart] وَجَآءَكَ [And has come to you] فِى [in] هَـٰذِهِ [this] ٱلْحَقُّ [the truth] وَمَوْعِظَةٌۭ [and an admonition] وَذِكْرَىٰ [and a reminder] لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ [for the believers]
ayahs.transliteration: Wakullan naqussu AAalayka min anba-iarrusuli ma nuthabbitu bihi fu-adaka wajaakafee hathihi alhaqqu wamawAAithatun wathikralilmu/mineen

ayahs.textUthmani: وَقُل لِّلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ ٱعْمَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمْ إِنَّا عَـٰمِلُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَقُل [And say] لِّلَّذِينَ [to those who] لَا [(do) not] يُؤْمِنُونَ [believe] ٱعْمَلُوا۟ [Work] عَلَىٰ [(according) to] مَكَانَتِكُمْ [your position] إِنَّا [indeed, we] عَـٰمِلُونَ [(are also) working]
ayahs.transliteration: Waqul lillatheena layu/minoona iAAmaloo AAala makanatikum innaAAamiloon

ayahs.wordByWord: وَٱنتَظِرُوٓا۟ [And wait] إِنَّا [indeed, we] مُنتَظِرُونَ [(are) ones who wait]

ayahs.textUthmani: وَلِلَّهِ غَيْبُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ يُرْجَعُ ٱلْأَمْرُ كُلُّهُۥ فَٱعْبُدْهُ وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَيْهِ ۚ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِغَـٰفِلٍ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَلِلَّهِ [And for Allah] غَيْبُ [(is the) unseen] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ [(of) the heavens] وَٱلْأَرْضِ [and the earth] وَإِلَيْهِ [and to Him] يُرْجَعُ [will be returned] ٱلْأَمْرُ [the matter] كُلُّهُۥ [all (of) it] فَٱعْبُدْهُ [so worship Him] وَتَوَكَّلْ [and put your trust] عَلَيْهِ ۚ [upon Him] وَمَا [And your Lord is not] رَبُّكَ [And your Lord is not] بِغَـٰفِلٍ [unaware] عَمَّا [of what] تَعْمَلُونَ [you do]
ayahs.transliteration: Walillahi ghaybu assamawatiwal-ardi wa-ilayhi yurjaAAu al-amru kulluhu faAAbudhuwatawakkal AAalayhi wama rabbuka bighafilin AAammataAAmaloon

ayahs.wordByWord: الٓر ۚ [Alif Laam Ra] تِلْكَ [These] ءَايَـٰتُ [(are the) Verses] ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ [(of) the Book] ٱلْمُبِينِ [[the] clear]

ayahs.textUthmani: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ قُرْءَٰنًا عَرَبِيًّا لَّعَلَّكُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: إِنَّآ [Indeed, We] أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ [We have sent it down] قُرْءَٰنًا [(as) a Quran in Arabic] عَرَبِيًّۭا [(as) a Quran in Arabic] لَّعَلَّكُمْ [so that you may] تَعْقِلُونَ [understand]

ayahs.textUthmani: نَحْنُ نَقُصُّ عَلَيْكَ أَحْسَنَ ٱلْقَصَصِ بِمَآ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْكَ هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ وَإِن كُنتَ مِن قَبْلِهِۦ لَمِنَ ٱلْغَـٰفِلِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: نَحْنُ [We] نَقُصُّ [relate] عَلَيْكَ [to you] أَحْسَنَ [the best] ٱلْقَصَصِ [of the narrations] بِمَآ [in what] أَوْحَيْنَآ [We have revealed] إِلَيْكَ [to you] هَـٰذَا [(of) this] ٱلْقُرْءَانَ [the Quran] وَإِن [although] كُنتَ [you were] مِن [before it] قَبْلِهِۦ [before it] لَمِنَ [surely among] ٱلْغَـٰفِلِينَ [the unaware]
ayahs.transliteration: Nahnu naqussu AAalayka ahsanaalqasasi bima awhayna ilayka hathaalqur-ana wa-in kunta min qablihi lamina alghafileen

ayahs.textUthmani: إِذْ قَالَ يُوسُفُ لِأَبِيهِ يَـٰٓأَبَتِ إِنِّى رَأَيْتُ أَحَدَ عَشَرَ كَوْكَبًا وَٱلشَّمْسَ وَٱلْقَمَرَ رَأَيْتُهُمْ لِى سَـٰجِدِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: إِذْ [When] قَالَ [said] يُوسُفُ [Yusuf] لِأَبِيهِ [to his father] يَـٰٓأَبَتِ [O my father] إِنِّى [Indeed, I] رَأَيْتُ [I saw] أَحَدَ [eleven] عَشَرَ [eleven] كَوْكَبًۭا [stars] وَٱلشَّمْسَ [and the sun] وَٱلْقَمَرَ [and the moon] رَأَيْتُهُمْ [I saw them] لِى [to me] سَـٰجِدِينَ [prostrating]
ayahs.transliteration: Ith qala yoosufu li-abeehi yaabati innee raaytu ahada AAashara kawkaban washshamsawalqamara raaytuhum lee sajideen
